summary: This document is an email chain from December 2008 discussing a draft letter to victims notifying them of Jeffrey Epstein's work release. The email shows coordination among legal or administrative staff regarding victim notification procedures.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the work release notification being drafted for victims; his work release is the topic of the correspondence.

events.title: Epstein Work Release Notification
events.description: Draft letter to victims is being prepared to notify them of Jeffrey Epstein's work release from incarceration.

keyFacts: A draft letter to victims regarding Jeffrey Epstein's work release was being prepared in December 2008.
The email shows coordination among staff to finalize victim notification language.
The document indicates ongoing legal/administrative procedures related to Epstein's incarceration and victim communications.
